name: Cryptocat dark
description: Makes firefox's cryptocat extension easier on the eyes.
additional_info:
1.5 Themed the download file button
1.4.1 Another padding fix
1.4 Cat icons turned to gray
1.3.1 Text selection fix
1.3 Fixed some elements not appearing and themed some dialogs.
1.2 More positioning fixes, colored "Can't sent this message" and removed transitions
1.1 Styled the progress bar, among other things
1.0.1 Small fix that pleases my ocd
1.0 Release
